name: Joint application ended (app 2)
body:
Your ((partner)) has ended the joint application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)). You cannot access the application anymore. 

They were not asked to provide a reason. You could contact them and ask them why, if it's safe to do so. 

Either you or your ((partner)) can create and submit a new application. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your ((partner)) has ended the joint application ((isDivorce??for your divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership))
